captions.text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro! Welcome to another Nerdy
Nummies!

Today, I’m gonna be making something Easy
Mode!

I got a lot of requests for more Rice Krispies
recipes, so today I’m gonna be

making chocolate rice krispies and peanut
butter rice krispies!

We’re gonna be theming them Minecraft because
I got so many emails for

more Minecraft! So here you go! I shall give
them to you!
Let’s get started!

The things you will need, because we are baking
2 recipes today, will be:

A big box of Rice Krispies cereal, peanut
butter chocolate, yum-yum-yum!

Regular peanut butter, pam baking spray, 2
bags of the 10 ounce mini

marshmallows, a sh-tick of butter, and a square
cookie cutter!

And, a 9x13 inch pan, it helps if you have
2, because we’re making 2 recipes,

but if you don’t, no worries, just refrigerate
1, and then switch ‘em out.

OK, first thing that we’re gonna do before
we head over to the stove is

grease our pan with a little bit of baking
spray.
Berrp!

OK, now we’re gonna take all of this and
head over to the stove!

Rice Krispies are super easy to make, the
first thing that you’re gonna do

is take a medium sized saucepan, put it on
the stove on a low heat,

and you’re gonna take 3 tablespoons of butter,
and put it in the pan and stir

it around until it melts. Once your butter
is melted you’re gonna take 10 ounces

of mini marshmallows, and pour them in the
pot, and stir them around until
they have liquified, and it’s super sticky!

Once your marshmallows are melted, you’re
going to turn off the heat,

and you’re going to pour in 2/3 cup of peanut
butter and mix around again
until everything is schmooth!

Now that the peanut butter is in there, we’re
gonna add 5 cups of Rice Krispies!

And we’re just gonna fold it in until it’s
all mixed.

Once your Rice Krispies are all mixed, you’re
just going to pour it into the glass

pan and then use a piece of wax paper and
press down on the top to make them

flat. Rice Krispies are all ready, I’m gonna
put these in the fridge for about

30 minutes to chill. And, to make your chocolate
peanut butter Rice Krispies,

same recipe, only instead of 2/3 cup of peanut
butter, 2/3 cup of
chocolate peanut butter! Yum-yum!

30 Minutes, I just popped these out of the
pan from the fridge, so they’re nice and

chilled, and what we’re gonna do is take
your square cookie cutter, and we’re

gonna cut out a bunch of squares into the
Rice Krispy treats.

Once you've cut out all your little Rice Krispies
squares, we’re just going to

double stack them, to make them look more
like a brick. So you’re just gonna

take 1, stack it on top of the other, and
then to make it look really nice you

can just push it in with your fingers, so
it looks like 1 piece.

And you’re just gonna do that to all of
your Rice Krispies treats.

We have got all of our Rice Krispies
double stacked, they smell so good!

Peanut butter Rice Krispies and chocolate
peanut butter Rice Krispies!

We are going to decorate now, all you'll need
are our white chocolate melts, and

we’re gonna heat those up, you can either
heat them up in the microwave or
on the stove, whatever’s easier.

And we have red Airheads, they are the cherry
flavor, those will be the red ones!

Not to be confused with the watermelon, I
think those are pink.
And green frosting. Mmmm!

And I’ve used this little tip with all these
little holes, because it makes

grass, I love this tip, I use it every time
I have to make grass on a cake or a
cupcake, very handy!

Let’s see, it’s a Wilton 233. That’s
what tip it is, Wilton 233.

Alright, and I’ll show you kind of what
it does, you put a little pressure.
Woooop!
And it makes little grass!
Look how cute that is!

OK, so we’re gonna first start with our
grass blocks, and we’re just gonna make
grass on top of our Rice Krispies treats!

Now that we’ve got our grass blocks all
done, we are gonna decorate our little

Minecraft cakes, they’re so cute! They’re
the tan color so the peanut butter
Rice Krispies worked perfectly!

I just melted a bunch of white chocolates
into this little squeezey bottle,

but you can do whatever you want, you can
even dip the top of them into a little

bowl if you want. I just chose this because
I thought it would be easier for me.

And you’re just gonna put it on the top,
1 layer on the top, and then we’re
gonna decorate the sides.

Now that we’ve got the chocolate on top
of all our little Minecraft Cakes,

we are gonna decorate the top using the little
red Airheads!

I’ve opened 1 so you can see, and now we’re
just gonna cut little squares
and put ‘em on the top!

You can make them a variety of sizes because
that’s what they look like in the

video game, just cut a bunch of little square
sizes.

Ta-da! Here are our Minecraft Rice Krispy
treats!

We have: Chocolate Peanut Butter Recipe, and
Peanut Butter Rice Krispy Recipe!

2 new recipes! Thanks you guys for suggesting
it!

These were super easy to make, easy mode treats,
Rice Krispy snacks are always

easy, and if you have any ideas for any other
Nerdy Nummies, please let me know,

leave me a comment down below and I will do
my best to make ‘em happen!
OK, thanks you guys! Bye-bye!

title: MINECRAFT RICE KRISPY TREATS - NERDY NUMMIES
